byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

abstract: Fox marketing team for movie The Sitter, which stars Jonah Hill, hangs posters reading 'Need a Sitter?' with image of Hill and phone number as marketing ploy for movie; about 250,000 people call number and Hill randomly answers a few calls himself as part of agreement with Fox.
snippet: Fox hung posters across the country printed with Mr. Hill’s image, the message “Need a Sitter?” and phone numbers on tear-off tab.
lead_paragraph: Fox hung posters across the country printed with Mr. Hill’s image, the message “Need a Sitter?” and phone numbers on tear-off tab.
